name: Low-Calorie Spicy Peanut Noodles
author: queenobscene13
summary: This is my absolute favorite way to eat shirataki noodles! The sauce is very versatile as well. Eat with chopsticks or a fork…or your hands! I'm not judging you.
ingredients: 1 (7 ounce) package shirataki noodles, drained and rinsed
2 tablespoons powdered peanut butter (such as PB2®)
1 cup peeled, seeded, and sliced cucumber
directions: Bring a pot of water to a boil
Cook noodles in the boiling water until heated through, about 1 minute
Drain and rinse noodles under cold water
Mix powdered peanut butter, soy sauce, sriracha sauce, and stevia together in a bowl
Add noodles, cucumber, and green onion and toss to coat
Refrigerate until flavors blend, about 20 minutes
